Title: Nope Nope Nope
Description:
I recovered this weapon on a recent scouting run near the wall. It would seem ideal for helping your Shado-Pan with their infestation problem in Gurthani Terrace.

The more they are focused on keeping spiders off the wall, the less time they are killing fear-gripped swarmborn.
ObjectivesText: Use the Shado-Pan Dragon Gun to destroy 20 Dreadspinner Eggs in Gurthani Terrace.
